response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,200,000 based on your needs and preferences. I understand its importance to you and am eager to ensure it finds the right home where it can truly make a difference.

To facilitate this transaction, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,150,000. This offer is designed to be attractive while also reflecting the significant value we place on this product. I hope this price aligns with your expectations and allows us to move forward towards a mutually beneficial agreement.

Please let me know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. I am here to assist you throughout this process and ensure a smooth transition.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
